standard.ruleset_reference: (Previously 6-14, Then 6-10) Table G3.1(6) Proposed Building Performance (i)
standard.rule_description: Where retail display lighting is included in the proposed building design the display lighting additional power shall be less than or equal to the limits established by Section 9.5.2.2(b)

rule-6-12-a.test_description: This test uses a simple building model with 1,000 ft2 of gross floor area containing a single zone and sales area space. The space has 650 watts of interior display lighting power, which falls below the ASHRAE 90.1 minimum allowance of 750 watts

standard.ruleset_reference: (Previously 6-14, Then 6-10) Table G3.1(6) Proposed Building Performance (i)
standard.rule_description: Where retail display lighting is included in the proposed building design the display lighting additional power shall be less than or equal to the limits established by Section 9.5.2.2(b)

rule-6-12-b.test_description: This test uses a simple building model with 1,000 ft2 of gross floor area containing a single zone and sales area space. The space has 2,000 watts of interior display lighting power, which exceeds the ASHRAE 90.1 maximum allowance of 1,750 watts for this space.

standard.ruleset_reference: (Previously 6-14, Then 6-10) Table G3.1(6) Proposed Building Performance (i)

rule-6-12-c.test_description: This test uses a simple building model with 1,000 ft2 of gross floor area containing a single zone and sales area space. The space has 1,000 watts of interior display lighting power, which falls between the minimum allowance (750W) and maximum allowance (1,750W).
rule-6-12-c.expected_raised_message_includes: It could not be determined whether the proposed retail display lighting power is less than or equal to the allowance calculated according to the formulas in ASHRAE 90.1 Section 9.5.2.2
